name: ETHER [Ludum Dare 41]
description:
Ether: A Game Jam Game

This was originally going to be a Visual Novel & Clicker/Idle Game Hybrid, but due to circumstances I could not get started on the majority of art assets, so now its a Text Adventure & Clicker/Idle Game Hybrid.  Made in Twine for the 41st Ludum Dare which theme's was "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres."

This game will eventually be updated with graphics in the next month to make it a "visual" novel.
